params.pools: list of the addresses of pangea pool

depositKlay(address).details: transaction will revert if the asset in the pool is not WKLAY

params.pool: the address of pangea pool to deposit

depositToken(address,address,uint128).details: Approval (token.approve(airdropDistributor, amount)) must be performed before transaction

params.pool: the address of pangea pool to deposit
params.token: token address to deposit. it must be one of the pools' tokens.

airdrop(address).notice: airdrop the deposited assets of pool

airdropAll().notice: airdrop the deposited assets all on this epoch

airdropPoolLength().notice: Number of pools that have ever been deposited

airdropSnapshot(address,uint256).notice: record of past airdrop information distributed

airdropSnapshotLength(address).notice: Number of airdrop action distributed to the pool

depositKlay(address).notice: deposit klay to the pool. this klay will be distributed to the next epoch

depositToken(address,address,uint128).notice: deposit Token to the pool. this token will be distributed to the next epoch

depositedAirdrop(address).notice: airdrop information deposited in the pool. amount0 & amount1 will be zero after airdrop allocation
